title: Research correct Emacs org-habit face colors
description:
Research the correct color mapping from Emacs org-habit.el to ensure organice matches exactly.

**Emacs faces to map:**
- org-habit-clear-face: days on which a task doesn't have to be done yet
- org-habit-ready-face: days on which a task should be done again  
- org-habit-alert-face: days on which a task is overdue
- org-habit-overdue-face: same as alert

**Status codes to map:**
- 'done': completed
- 'future': not due yet (in grace period)
- 'scheduled': scheduled but not due
- 'overdue': overdue
- 'missed': missed deadline
- 'due-soon': due tomorrow

**Deliverable:**
Document the correct color mapping between organice status codes and Emacs face colors.

title: Implement habit consistency calculation engine
description:
Parse state change logs from LOGBOOK to determine when habits were completed. Calculate which days are blue (not due yet), green (could be done), yellow (would be overdue tomorrow), and red (overdue). This requires:
- Parse - State 'DONE' log entries
- Compare with scheduled dates and repeat intervals (.+2d/3d format)
- Determine consistency status for each day in the graph window
- Handle edge cases for different repeat types (+, ++, .+)
